summary: A wealthy casino owner is murdered in her mansion at 36, China Town and the investigating detective uncovers multiple suspects, all with independent motives to commit the crime.
cast: Akshaye Khanna|Kareena Kapoor|Shahid Kapoor|Paresh Rawal|Payal Rohatgi|Johnny Lever|Tanaaz Currim Irani|Isha Koppikar|Tanushree Dutta|Upen Patel|Priyanka Chopra|Vivek Shauq|Raj Zutshi|Dinyar Contractor|Roshan Tirandaz|Preeti Puri|Sambhavna Sheth|Vivek Vaswani|Nassar Abdulla|Harish Shetty|Sehajjot Singh Arora|Anurag Prapanna|Stephanie Page|Steven Baker
keywords: address in title|corpse in a suitcase|lost child|detective|farce
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mustan), Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mustan)
title: 36 China Town
